Text: awesome you promised and here it is thanks daman.
From now on, Every Anime that is 1-13 episodes will always have FLAC regardless of Resolution/Quality.

@Daman IMO you should stick to smaller files, after all good quality for a reasonable file size & dual audio is what your notorious for.
The difference in FLAC audio is almost unnoticeable & 2 FLAC audio tracks bloats the hell out of this torrent.
BakaBT is where people go to get top quality anime (anyone who doesn't know what BakaBT is your going to want to google this)

As a last effort to persuade you, if you remember when you offered Darker than Black people were downloading another English only torrent rather than your own, and it was purely because it was of smaller size, I wish I could provide more examples to show you that smaller files are preferred but i cannot

People who want to keep the anime want smaller files, this is why I and many others love your torrents, so I hope you reconsider always using FLAC audio.
